item.description:
This event is being held at Danny's Scooter Shop, Rt. 28, Avon,

Meet-up at South Bay Shopping Center at 10:30 am to ride TO Danny's, .


AGENDA

  • BBQ at NOON
  • Safety is NO Accident Seminar
  • Group Ride (practicing tips we just covered)& probably stop for ice cream!


The seminar will feature speakers on the following topics

  • Riding Tips (solo & group)
  • Pre-Ride Inspections
  • Safety Maintenance
  • Safety Gear

and demonstrations such as

  • how to pick up your dropped scooter
  • group riding hand signals
  • Safety Gear


    We will also have a SALE on safety gear that day.

    Please reply with requests and suggestions for this event.

    Rob Gagne will lead a group to Danny's Scooter Shop from Boston.

    We will meet at the South Bay Shopping Center in Dorchester (more precise location below)
    Meet there between 10:30 and 11:00 am. We will leave there at approx. 11:15 am.
    The route will be suitable for all size scooters, the approx. distance is 13 miles.

    We will meet in the parking area in front of Bank of America the corner of Mass. Ave. and Allstate Rd. in Dorchester.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Bank of America
item.name: BBQ,Safety is No Accident & Group ride at Danny's Scooter Shop
